name: Space Patrol
overview: The Federation of Planets has control of strategic planetary bodies in our solar system and needs to protect their interest. You, as a Space Patrol cadet, will patrol the various planets looking for smugglers and aliens intent on capturing the established outpost. Your tank is equipped with the latest technologies to help you survive any onslaught you may encounter. The object is to complete the varying legs of the patrol course as quickly as you can while avoiding rocks, craters, mines, attacks from enemy craft, and more. Your on-screen display has indicator lights warning you of approaching danger. Keep an eye on it to stay ahead of threats. Reach the 5 major check points and have your time evaluated against the average time. Beat it for bonus points. Play among 4 different planetary bodies. They each have different challenges and play at different levels. Do you think you are good enough to handle Mercury?
